name: Titanium - Unpainted
desc: Titanium is a strong, beautiful material for a wheelchair frame

name: Magnesium - Painted
desc: Magnesium is even lighter than Titanium, and it can be painted to any color you want!

name: Anodized Aluminum Brackets
desc: These brackets hold the camber tube to the frame.

name: Carbon Fiber
desc: A super light and stiff backrest.

name: Plastic
desc: Nothing beats the simplicity and ease of maintenance of a plastic seat back.

name: Upholstery
desc: A clasic fabric sling is the lightest option.

name: DT Swiss Wheel Rim
desc: The DT Swiss Wheel Rim is the lightest and most stiff option out there.

name: Titanium
desc: Titanium is strong and light, but easily dented

name: Black Anodized Aluminum
desc: The aluminum hand rim is more dent resistant and slightly heavier.

name: Q-Grip from Out-front
desc: The Q-Grip hand rim is great for those with low hand dexterity

name: Rightrun
desc: Rightrun tires offer style and lightness.

name: Standard
desc: The standard tire is more puncture resistant, but slightly heavier

name: Softroller
desc: The Softroller offers some bounce to your ride.

name: Single Hand Operating Brakes
desc: Compact, reliable, and opperable with just one hand.

name: No Brakes
desc: Cutting weight? Live life on the edge with no wheel locks√ñ you rebel you.
